purpleculture_pinyin:
jiàn
key (on a piano or computer keyboard); button (on a mouse or other device); chemical bond; linchpin
ключ (на клавиатуре пианино или компьютера); кнопка (на мышке или другом устройстве); химическая связь; шпилька

(Simplified: 键)
Pictophonetic: 建 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.

    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 建 [ jiàn ] to build, to erect; to establish, to found
heisig_chinese_memo: One company builds keyboard keys in metal for heavy metal bands.
heisig_constituent: key, metal, gold, build, brush, stretch
heisig_story: The golden key you have been presented by the mayor gives you access to all the buildings in the city.
myStory:
не фундамент, а макет

рисовать раскрывание железом кистью

ключ - металл от дома, замок - металл утвержденная правильность
koohiiStory1: The metal thing you need in order to enter things you build is a key.
koohiiStory2: 鍵盤key (#2761) ケン, かぎ ... Parts: 金, 建 ... Story: The most important Metal in any building is the lock on the front door, and without a key you ain´t getting in. This kanji means both lock and key to most Japanese people. 錠前 is technically the word for lock but it´s not used in daily conversation. ... 熟語: ... cf: 錠前.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You take some gold and cover your yoga brush in it, turning it into a key. You shove the brush you normally use for yoga into the lock to your car and pour the gold over it. Now it's the right shape to be a key!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You lost your old key, you see. But you're a go with the flow type of person, thanks to all the yoga, so you make a new one!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This key has to be perfect, because if it isn't the car guillotine (かぎ) will come down and chop off your hand!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine carefully putting your makeshift key into your car's lock. You close your eyes and pray that the car guillotine isn't going to trigger, knowing it isn't a legit key.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 建 (たてる、たて、たつ、ケン、コン строить).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the gold (金) you need to get into a building (建) is a key
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You should look into investing in keyboard keys.  It's one of the most valuable things your can build metal into because people will always want to hear their sound.
humanum_short_description_en: " Key " is also used as "鑳", the original meaning is the horizontal bar that runs through the two ears on the tripod. "Shuowen": "Key, Xuan Ye. One is Cheju. From Jin Jiansheng." "Yu Pian": "It is also used as 鑳.
humanum_short_description: 「鍵」亦作「鑳」，初義為鼎上貫兩耳的橫杠。《說文》：「鍵，鉉也。一曰車轄。从金建聲。」《玉篇》：「亦作鑳。」

Pictophonetic: 建 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 建 [ jiàn ] to build, to erect; to establish, to found
①安裝在車軸頭上管住車輪或使軸與齒輪等連接固定的零件，一般是用鋼製的長方條(亦稱“轄”)：關鍵。
②插在門上關鎖門戶的金屬棍子：“掌授管鍵以啓閉國門”。
③琴或機器上使用時用手按動的部分：鍵盤。鍵子。琴鍵。

鍵字的基本解释

鍵
jiàn
见“键”。

鍵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》其偃切，上阮，羣。］
［《廣韻》其輦切，上獮，羣。］
［《廣韻》渠焉切，平仙，羣。］
“键1”的繁体字。亦作“鑳1”。
(1)插门的金属棍子；门闩。
(2)锁簧。
(3)锁闭，关闭。一说义为折。
(4)见“鈐鍵”。
(5)键闭星的省称。
(6)车辖。
(7)琴、打字机或其他机器上，使用时按动的部分。
(8)一种机械零件，用以连接轴与齿轮或皮带轮并使之固定在一起。
(9)在化学结构式中表示元素原子价的短横线。

鍵字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鍵； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1315第14
【唐韻】渠偃切【韻會】巨偃切，?音楗。【說文】鉉也。一曰車轄也。　又【韻會】籥牡也。【禮·月令】修鍵閉。【註】鍵牡閉牝也。【疏】凡鏁器，入者謂之牡，受者謂之牝，俗云鎖須閉者，鎖筒也。【周禮·地官】司門掌授管鍵。【小爾雅】鍵謂之鑰。　又【揚子·太?經】?鍵挈契。【註】?，乖也。鍵，析也。　又星名。【前漢·天文志】鍵閉一星近鉤鈐，主關鑰，謂之天鍵。　又通作健。【前漢·司馬遷傳】大道之要去健羨。【服虔曰】門戸健牡也。　又【廣韻】其輦切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】巨展切，?音楗。又【廣韻】【集韻】?紀偃切，音湕。又【集韻】九件切，音蹇。又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?渠焉切，音乾。又【集韻】渠建切，音健。?籥牡也。　【玉篇】亦作鑳。

鍵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鍵字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
key
jiàn

key
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guangyun" Qi Yanqie, Shangruan, group. ]
["Guangyun" has its round cut, upright, group. ]
["Guangyun" Qu Yanqie, Pingxian, Qun. ]
Traditional characters for "key 1". Also known as "鑳1".
(1) A metal stick for inserting a door; a latch.
(2) Lock spring.
(3) Lock and close. To say righteousness is to compromise.
(4) See "seal key".
(5) The provincial name of the key closed star.
(6) Vehicle jurisdiction.
(7) On the piano, typewriter or other machine, the part that is pressed during use.
(8) A mechanical part used to connect shafts and gears or pulleys and fix them together.
(9) In the chemical structure formula, the dashes indicating the valences of the elements.
key

[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　key; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1315 14
[Tang Yun] Qu Yan cut [Yun Hui] Giant Yan cut,? Sound. [Said Wen] Hyun Ye. One said that the car is under the jurisdiction.　[Rhyme Club] Yumu also. 【Rite·Monthly Order】Close the repair key. [Note] The key is also closed. 【Sparse】Where the instrument is used, the person who enters it is called the male, the recipient is called the 牝, and the person who must be closed by the common cloud lock is also the lock cylinder. 【Zhou Li·Guan Guan】The key to the master's authority. [Little Erya] The key is called the key.　[Yangtze·Tai? Scripture]? [Note]? Be good. Key, analysis also.　Also star name. [Previous Han·Astronomical Chronicles] Close the one-star close-hook seal, the master key, which is called the sky key.　Tong Zuojian again. [Previous Han·Sima Qian Biography] Dadaozhi is going to Jianxian. [Fuqian said] Mentor Jianmu also.　[Guangyun] It also cuts [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] is a huge cut,? Sound. And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ji Yan cut, Yin Qi. Also 【Jiyun】Nine pieces cut, sound flopped. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Qu Yan cut, sound dry. Also [Jiyun] Qu Jianqie, sound health. ?Yuemu also.　【Jade articles】also made 鑳.

Name meaning

jiàn
вм. 键
Radicals: 金, 廴, 聿  (gold, yoga, brush)
Meaning Mnemonic
You take some gold and cover your yoga brush in it, turning it into a key. You shove the brush you normally use for yoga into the lock to your car and pour the gold over it. Now it's the right shape to be a key!
You lost your old key, you see. But you're a go with the flow type of person, thanks to all the yoga, so you make a new one!
Reading Mnemonic
This key has to be perfect, because if it isn't the car guillotine (かぎ) will come down and chop off your hand!
Imagine carefully putting your makeshift key into your car's lock. You close your eyes and pray that the car guillotine isn't going to trigger, knowing it isn't a legit key.
